body:
Comment 7: 
I have created a CL to change the API of Iter.  I believe this API is more useful in
practice and will make your case, as well as others, simpler.  ASCII performance is
worse, but for other character sets performance is similar or even better and it is
fairly simple to optimize the ASCII case.  See https://golang.org/cl/6873072
for details.  This CL includes an example that shows how to implement EqualNorm in your
case.
